citances.sentence: The applicant applied for leave to appeal from the freezing orders that I made. The application for leave to appeal was heard by Lander J, who, on 4 March 2009, refused the application ( Time 2000 Systems (Australia) Pty Ltd ACN 127 853 614 v Rafferty [2009] FCA 216).
